title: Powerful Dashboard
text: All-in-one dashboard with essential key performance metrics and next-gen graphing capabilities.

title: Unlimited SP Campaigns
text: No limits or maximums. Run as many Sponsored Products campaigns as you’d like.

title: Targeted Keyword Suggestions
text: Easy to execute keyword actions make reducing wasted ad spend and increasing profitability simple

title: Expert Support
text: Never go alone again. Take advantage of online, expert chat with our Customer Success team.

title: Value-based Bidding
text: With our value-based bidding automation you’ll never pay too much (or too little) for a bid again.

title: Your Data, Your Way
text: Our calendar allows you to see your data in a daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, or even custom view.
